items.author: defaced
items.title: Layout shift gif generator
items.description: Easily identify problematic layout shifts in the viewport on mobile and desktop. Available as a simple command line tool, or as an online tool. With layout shifting now negatively impacts search results, this resource is very useful.

items.title: mmmhmm
items.author: mmhmm inc.
items.description: Thanks to COVID a lot of us are working from home. That made video calls an everyday thing and we personally like how we are rethinking our way of working in a team. However, there are some downsides and one main issue is presenting or pitching in a Zoom call. In a presentation the presenter is supported by its slides. In a video conference everyone is just looking at your slides and you lose a lot of non-verbal communication. Here comes mmhmm in the picture. They created an application where you can bring that magic back. By combining your webcam video with your screen you can decide how big or small one of the other is. You can even collaborate with other people as well so they can continue their presentation with the same slides without having to switch screens. You can be back creative and having control over how your presentation is coming forward!

items.title: The Greenland ice sheet has melted past the point of no return
items.author: The economist
items.description: We all live on the same planet. We should take care of it and it seems like this article is proving again and again that we aren't. This article is yet another reminder that we really need to start taking meaningful action if we aren't already. It's an interesting read.

author: Wheelhouse
title: The 5 Wheelhouse picks going into september
introduction: These are some links that we found the most interesting going into september. Each month we pick 1 thing we found very interesting and put it into a list. This list might give you some insight in how Wheelhouse thinks and what intrigues us.
description: Every month we each pick the greatest thing that we found last month and share it with you
